name: Ask Your Mom
description:
Ask Your Mom is a Surreal/Horror/Comedy Adventure RPG about a young girl who wants to go out and play with her friend but has to ask her mom first, unfortunately her mom happens to be an eldritch god.

Made for My First Game Jam: Winter 2020, in about 14 days and is my first game ever made, using RPG Maker XP. I had very limited experience of the engine I was using so expect improvements and streamlining once I get more used to it.

CONTROLS:

X - Back/Menu
C/Enter - Select/Interact
Arrow Keys - Movement

KNOWN GLITCHES :

-A lot of clipping errors, graphics are placeholders so this will be fixed once I have a chance to update them

CURRENT VERSION: 1.0

CHANGELOG:

-Added RTP, also I tried to compress the game and it failed so I guess it stays a zip then
